Columns.Description: The timestamp (UTC) of when the log record was generated.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The operation associated with the log record.
Columns.Name: OperationName

Columns.Description: The API version against which the operation was performed.
Columns.Name: OperationVersion

Columns.Description: The result of the audit operation.
Columns.Name: ResultType

Columns.Description: IP address of the user who has performed the operation.
Columns.Name: CallerIpAddress

Columns.Description: W3C Trace Context information used for event correlation.
Columns.Name: TraceContext

Columns.Description: Internal ADP correlation ID needed for support scenarios.
Columns.Name: CorrelationId

Columns.Description: Additional properties related to the audit event.
Columns.Name: Properties

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
